Title: Place an order after adding an item to cart
Steps:
-click on the product
-click on add to cart then click ok
-navigate to cart
-click on place order
-fill in the form 
-click on purchase
Expected result:
- A confirmation appear with amount ,card number,name and date
- clicking Ok returns to homepage
Actual Result:
- A confirmation appear with amount ,card number,name and date
- clicking Ok returns to homepage

Title: Place order with empty cart
Steps:
-navigate to cart without adding any items
-click on place order
Expected result: -error message appear "Please add items to your cart"
Actual Result:
-the form opens and
- a confirmation appears with no items in the cart

Title: Place order with empty form
Steps:
-click on the product
-click on add to cart then click ok
-navigate to cart
-click on place order
-leave the form blank 
-click on purchase
Expected result:
-form should not submit
-error message appear "Please fill the form"

Title: Remove product from cart before checkout
Steps:
-click on the product
-click on add to cart then click ok
-navigate to cart and click delete
Expected result:
-no order is placed 
-cart should be empty

Title: Verify purchase amount match cart total
Steps:
-add more products to cart
-navigate to cart
-note the total price
proceed to place order and complete it

Title: Reuse place order flow after previous purchase
Steps:
-complete a full purchase
-add another product
-place order again
Expected result:
-second order can placed successfuly
-confirmation shown each time
-cart reset after each purchase
Actual Result:
-second order placed successfuly
-confirmation shown each time
-cart reset after each purchase

Title: Verify form submits successfully with valid name,card number and expiry details
Preconditions:
-User is in cart page and there is at least one item in the cart
-click place order to open payment model
Test Data:
name: ahmed
country: egypt 
city: cairo 
credit card: 12345
month: 12
year: 2030
Expected result: -confirmation message appear with purchase ID and amount
Actual Result: -confirmation message appear with purchase ID and amount

Title: Empty field submission
Preconditions:
-User is in cart page and there is at least one item in the cart
-click place order to open payment model
Expected result:
-payment is not proceed
-no confirmation appear
-alert is shown
Actual Result: -error message " Please fill out name and creditcard"

Title: Invalid credit card
Preconditions:
-User is in cart page and there is at least one item in the cart
-click place order to open payment model
Steps:
-enter all fields with invalid credit card
-click purchase
Test Data:
name: ahmed
country: egypt 
city: cairo 
credit card: abcde
month: 12
year: 2030
Actual Result: -confirmation message appear with purchase ID and amount

Title: Expiry month (out of range)
Preconditions:
-User is in cart page and there is at least one item in the cart
-click place order to open payment model
Steps:
-enter all fields with out of range month 
-click purchase
Test Data:
name: ahmed
country: egypt 
city: cairo 
credit card: 12345
month: 13
year: 2030
Actual Result: -confirmation message appear with purchase ID and amount

Title: Expiry year ( past)
Preconditions:
-User is in cart page and there is at least one item in the cart
-click place order to open payment model
Steps:
-enter all fields with year in the past 
-click purchase
Test Data:
name: ahmed
country: egypt 
city: cairo 
credit card: 12345
month: 12
year: 2020
Actual Result: -confirmation message appear with purchase ID and amount

Title: Name field empty
Preconditions:
-User is in cart page and there is at least one item in the cart
-click place order to open payment model
Test Data:
name: 
country: egypt 
city: cairo 
credit card: abcde
month: 12
year: 2030
Actual Result: -error message " Please fill out name and creditcard"

Title: Year and month with text
Preconditions:
-User is in cart page and there is at least one item in the cart
-click place order to open payment model
Test Data:
name: ahmed
country: egypt 
city: cairo 
credit card: 12345
month: twelve
year: two thousand thirty
Actual Result: -confirmation message appear with purchase ID and amount

Title: Name with only special characters
Preconditions:
-User is in cart page and there is at least one item in the cart
-click place order to open payment model
Test Data:
name: !@#$%
country: egypt 
city: cairo 
credit card: 12345
month: 12
year: 2030
Actual Result: -confirmation message appear with purchase ID and amount

Title: Valid card with spaces
Preconditions:
-User is in cart page and there is at least one item in the cart
-click place order to open payment model
Test Data:
name: ahmed
country: egypt 
city: cairo 
credit card: 1   2     345
month: 12
year: 2030
Actual Result: -confirmation message appear with purchase ID and amount

Title: Logout button is visible after login
Expected result: -The logout button is present and clickable
Actual Result: -The logout button is present and clickable

Title: Successful logout via the logout button
Logout from a page and try to complete order from different page
Steps:
-open different pages from website and logout from one page 
-try to complete order from another page
Expected result: - User is logged out from all pages
Actual Result: - User is logged out from all pages

Title: Multiple logout clicks
Expected result: -The second click should not cause errors and user should be logged out
Actual Result: -user is logged out and nothing unexpected happened

Title: Back button after logout
Actual Result: -User is returned while he was logged in

Title: Refresh after logout
Logout while a transaction is in progress
Expected result: -System should terminate session and not leave partial transaction open
Actual Result: -Sytem terminated session and user logged out

Title: Verify that the website logo is displayed
Expected result: -logo is visible on the top left corner
Actual Result: -logo is visible on the top left corner

Title: Verify that clicking the logo reloads the homepage
Steps:
-navigate to another page
-click the store logo

Title: Verify presence of navigation menu items
Verify “Home” link functionality
Verify “Contact” link opens contact modal
Verify “About us” link opens about modal
Verify “Cart” link redirects to cart page
Verify “Log in” link opens login modal
Verify “Sign up” link opens signup modal
Verify product categories are listed
Verify "Phones" filter displays only phone products
Verify "Laptops" filter displays only laptop products
Verify "Monitors" filter displays only monitor products
Verify that each product has at least one image displayed
Expected result: -Each product card should display a visible image.

Title: Verify that clicking a product opens the detailed product image
Expected result: -User is redirected to the product details page with the product image displayed.
Actual Result: -User should be redirected to the product page correctly

Title: Verify that image resolution is clear and not pixelated
Steps:
-Open the product page
-Observe clarity and scaling of image

Title: Verify that the product image corresponds to the correct product
Expected result: -Image shown must match the product name and description
Actual Result: -Images are correctly refer to the product

Title: Verify that images do not overlap with text or buttons
Steps:
-Scroll through the product page
-Observe photos with text
Expected result: -Image placement should be neat,no overlap or misalignment with text

Title: Verify image loading (no broken links)
Steps:
-Inspect each product image
-Check for broken image icon or empty space.
Expected result: -All images should load without broken icons or “image not found” placeholders
